identificationModule.briefTitle: Intracardiac Flow Assessment in Cardiac Amyloidosis
identificationModule.officialTitle: Intracardiac Flow Assessment in Cardiac Amyloidosis

descriptionModule.briefSummary: The primary objective of this study is to define the intracardiac flow imaging biomarkers in cardiac amyloidosis.

armGroups.label: Transthyretin (ATTR) cardiac amyloidosis
armGroups.description: Subjects diagnosed with ATTR cardiac amyloidosis will have CMR, TTE, and 6-minute walk
interventionNames: Diagnostic Test: Cardiac magnetic resonance image (CMR)

armGroups.label: Light chain amyloidosis (AL) with cardiac involvement
armGroups.description: Subjects diagnosed with AL with cardiac involvement will have CMR, TTE, and 6-minute walk
interventionNames: Diagnostic Test: Cardiac magnetic resonance image (CMR)

armGroups.label: Light chain amyloidosis (AL) without cardiac involvement
armGroups.description: Subjects diagnosed with AL without cardiac involvement will have CMR, TTE, and 6-minute walk
interventionNames: Diagnostic Test: Cardiac magnetic resonance image (CMR)

armGroups.label: Healthy Control
armGroups.description: Subjects without history of cardiovascular diseases will have CMR, TTE, and 6-minute walk
interventionNames: Diagnostic Test: Cardiac magnetic resonance image (CMR)

interventions.name: Cardiac magnetic resonance image (CMR)
interventions.description: A magnetic resonance imaging study for assessment of cardiac structure and intracardiac flow
armGroupLabels: Light chain amyloidosis (AL) with cardiac involvement
Light chain amyloidosis (AL) without cardiac involvement

interventions.name: Transthoracic Echocardiogram (TTE)
interventions.description: An imaging test that uses soundwaves that cannot be heard (ultrasound) to take pictures of the heart and vessels.
armGroupLabels: Light chain amyloidosis (AL) with cardiac involvement
Light chain amyloidosis (AL) without cardiac involvement

interventions.name: Six-minute Walk Test
interventions.description: A self-paced, test of exercise capacity performed unencouraged intensity that measures the distance that patients can walk on a flat, hard surface in a period of 6 minutes
armGroupLabels: Light chain amyloidosis (AL) with cardiac involvement
Light chain amyloidosis (AL) without cardiac involvement

primaryOutcomes.measure: Define the intracardiac flow imaging biomarkers in cardiac amyloidosis (CA)
primaryOutcomes.description: Measured by cardiac magnetic resonance imaging (CMR)

eligibilityModule.studyPopulation: Patients with amyloidosis without and with cardiac involvement, and normal healthy volunteers
